Discover Our Completed and Ongoing Work

Explore our portfolio of completed and ongoing projects. Each one is a testament to our commitment to quality and innovation.

Introducing Rose Villa - Your Gateway to Luxury in Varca, Goa

Elite Homes proudly present Rose Villa, our inaugural project featuring luxurious 3-bedroom boutique row villas in the heart of Varca, Goa. These homes are a short walk away from the pristine white sands of Varca Beach, surrounded by swaying coconut palms and lush greenery, offering an idyllic escape from the city's hustle and bustle.

Nestled in an ideal location, Rose Villas are close to renowned hotels, delightful restaurants, popular tourist attractions, supermarkets, and all essential amenities. Whether you're seeking a dream holiday home or a smart investment for future appreciation, Rose Villas is the perfect choice.

Experience a lifetime of luxury at Rose Villa.

Amenities

Gated Complex

Our gated complex is designed to offer you the peace of mind and security you deserve. This thoughtfully planned community provides controlled access, ensuring that you and your loved ones live in a safe and private environment.

Security Cabin

Our security cabin is the first line of defense in ensuring the safety and well-being of our residents. Located at the entrance of our gated complex, this cabin is staffed by trained security personnel who are vigilant and dedicated to your protection.

EV Charging Point

In line with our commitment to modern living and sustainability, our EV charging point is a feature that adds a touch of the future to our community. EVs are becoming increasingly popular for their eco-friendly and cost-effective advantages.

CCTV Surveillance

Your safety is paramount to us, and our CCTV surveillance system is a crucial component of our security infrastructure. This modern technology ensures that every corner of our community is under watchful eyes, providing you with peace of mind and a sense of security.

Video Door Phone

Our video door phone system is your high-tech gateway to secure and convenient access control. This innovative feature is a modern solution that enhances both security and convenience and allows you to see and communicate with visitors before granting them entry.

Landscape Garden

Our meticulously designed landscape garden is not just a green space; it's a sanctuary of nature, tranquility, and beauty that enriches your daily life. We have created a harmonious and eco-friendly environment, where residents can reconnect with the outdoors and enjoy the benefits of lush, green surroundings.

Covered Car Parking

Our covered car parking area is more than just a convenience; it's an essential component of our commitment to providing a secure and comfortable living environment. This feature ensures that your vehicles are shielded from the elements and enhances their longevity.

Completed Projects

1 2 3 4

Discover Our Completed Project near Manoj Gardens, Hubli, Karnataka

We are excited to introduce our completed and all-sold-out project located in the charming vicinity of Manoj Gardens, Hubli, Karnataka. This promising development is set to redefine modern living in this thriving city. Project featuring luxurious 3-BHK and 4-BHK fully furnished villas.
